Method Detail

    UsersModelLogin::getForm

    getForm( [array $data = array()], [boolean $loadData = true] );

    Parameters

    $data

    An optional array of data for the form to interogate.

    $loadData

    True if the form is to load its own data (default case), false if not.

    Returns

    A JForm object on success, false on failure

    Remarks

    Method to get the login form.

    The base form is loaded from XML and then an event is fired for users plugins to extend the form with extra fields.

    since

    1.6

    access

    public

    [ Top ]


    UsersModelLogin::loadFormData

    loadFormData( );

    Returns

    The default data is an empty array.

    Remarks

    Method to get the data that should be injected in the form.

    UsersModelLogin::preprocessForm

    preprocessForm( JForm $form, mixed $data, [string $group = 'user'] );

    Parameters

    $form

    form object.

    $data

    The data expected for the form.

    $group

    The name of the plugin group to import (defaults to "content").

    Remarks

    Method to allow derived classes to preprocess the form.

    throws

    Exception if there is an error in the form event.
